content: I never used Redbox. I used to use Blockbuster and Hastings, though. Actually, I have used my DVD player in the last month or two. I miss Hastings to rent movies at.Regarding the blogging, I may just take you up the offer of watching the classes. Wordpress and I aren’t friends, though. Unless they have made it easier to use. I have to see what my schedule looks like on the 24th.
